paragraph.value: Table 3 provides a summary of the results. We compare the results of our methods of the pre-trained BERT, using both the headline and text body, and the Coh-Metrix approach, to the language-based baseline with Multinomial Naive Bayes from (Golbeck et al., 2018)2. score. The two-tailed paired t-test with a 0.05 significance level was used for testing statistical significance of performance differences. Overall, these results provide an answer to research question RQ1 regarding the existence of semantic and linguistic difference between fake news and satire.
